dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Have you heard about the legendary smoking pipe? They say it's the best pipe for smoking pipeweed.

dialog.name: tellmore
dialog.message: If you smoke some pipeweed using that smoking pipe, you will be granted confusion and weapon magic protection, or so the rumour says.
It has long been lost, however...

response.message: Any ideas where it could be?

dialog.name: location
dialog.message: Well, some rumours say that the fierce dragon leader Scursaur has it in his possession.
Of course, that's just a silly rumour... a dragon with a smoking pipe...

dialog.name: aboutleader
dialog.message: He is the leader of the dragons on the Dragons Island. Apparently it's possible to get to Dragons Island by completing the Underground Maze under Promethia Island.
I wouldn't go there if I were you, though. The maze is one thing, but those dragons were sealed on that island for a reason...
At any rate, the smoking pipe is most likely not even there, anyway. It would be a waste of time to go looking for it there.
